column1: everetdawson "7. So do something new today. Don't be afraid...in the unknown be great today
column2: we're here with you. /FIN" "Tue Sep 06 18:03:59 +0000 2016" True

column1: everetdawson "6. Great people are not fearless
column2: they just seem to be able to embrace what they don't know and let it teach them all the necessary lessons" "Tue Sep 06 18:01:45 +0000 2016" True

column1: everetdawson "5. Success
column2: at the end of the day
column3: seems to me to be achieved by ignoring how little you know and ploughing forward anyway." "Tue Sep 06 18:01:02 +0000 2016" True

column1: everetdawson "4. The point being
column2: don't do it. Don't jump ship. Don't run from the possibility of success just because you may not know what you're doing." "Tue Sep 06 17:59:33 +0000 2016" True

column1: everetdawson "3. Which I think is true for most folks
column2: honestly. Which means sometimes when we see things start to come together
column3: we tend to jump ship." "Tue Sep 06 17:58:51 +0000 2016" True

column1: everetdawson "2. The terrible truth though
column2: is that I have NO idea what I'm doing. It's all just...guess work. Doing my best to see need and fulfill it." "Tue Sep 06 17:57:59 +0000 2016" True
